product_name: Eureka Copper Canyon 5 Tent + Screen Room
long_description: The Eureka Copper Canyon 5 + Screen Room is a spacious and sturdy cabin-style tent that sleeps 5, and has a separate screen room for hanging out, bug free! 9-pole cabin-style tent provides generous living space; tent space is divided into equal-size sleeping area and screen room. 3 large D-style doors with half windows provide access to sleeping area or screen room; includes 2 exterior doors plus an interior door for passage to/from screen room. Freestanding, combination steel/fiberglass frame with clips, pole sleeves and ring-and-pin assembly makes setup easy. Full mesh roof allows circulation of air and reduces condensation. 6 windows offer visibility and ventilation; includes 2 on exterior doors, 2 on sides and 2 on rear panel. Windows stash in their own pockets which eliminates hassling with fabric ties or loops/toggles. Screen room's perimeter sod cloth helps keep insects out. 2 gear lofts and interior pockets store small, personal gear. Stormshield(R) polyester fly provides a durable, longlasting and sag-free cover; weatherproof door and window panels seal out the elements and allow ventilation control. Bring electrical power cord inside tent through dedicated, zippered port. Guylines stow out of the way on Copper Canyon 5 rainfly during setup/takedown. Includes stuff sacks, stakes and guyline.
short_description: The Eureka Copper Canyon 5 + Screen Room is a spacious and sturdy cabin-style tent that sleeps 5, and has a separate screen room for hanging out, bug free!
